reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were due to stay in this hostel for 4 days but left after 2. This is a very over rated hostel, while the room was clean it was overlooking the street (we were on the 5th floor) and the street and bar noise was so excessive and that combined with the heat as there is not air conditioning or fans meant that we didn't sleep for 2 nights. We were very disappointed as at 80 euros a night for the room were were expecting much more. The breakfast was poor and they wouldn't allow us to access the bottled water fountain during the day. We left and payed an additional 5 euros for a room in the Ibis much closer to town.
reviews.title: Give this place a miss

reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights with my sister in December 2006.
reviews.title: Private twin room - very nice

reviews.text: We decided to stay in a youth hostel as the price was a lot lower than twin rooms in hotels in Munich.
reviews.title: great for the price....
Not reccommeded for a school trip
reviews.text: The room was very clean and relatively spacious, comfy beds, bed linen was fresh and clean. TV, decent radio alarm, small desk, a clean sofa. Like in some other continental buildings, the windows had good drapes and metallic rolling curtains to block out the morning sun. Ensuite shower & wc room also very clean. Excellent water pressure in the shower!

Rooms were ensuite which was a plus. They provided clean sheets, thank god because the pillows and comforter were stained. There was an odd smell in the bathroom it might have been the smell of the brewery across the street. I looked at the shower and dedcided not to use it, it wasn't filthy but the smell of the bathroom was too much. Beer hall across the street is great. Light Breakfast is provided. Location close to the train station and Oktoberfest grounds.
reviews.title: Ok. Standard Hostel fare.
Cheap clean and friendly!!
reviews.text: Had a single ensuite room at 49 euros per night. I cannot praise this place enought. Friendly helpfull staff, location is excellent, wonderful beerhall opposite, very clean bright room, room was cleaned every day, fresh towels every day, TV/clock/radio in room, breakfast was v good!!!
